p_char_4110_delphn.description: A refined cufflink. Servicemen of Windermere lineage have always been fastidious about their martial appearances, with not a hair out of place. Now, she's removed this small token of her own accord, and gifted it to you.
p_char_4110_delphn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Delphine.

p_char_494_vendla.name: Vendela's Token
p_char_494_vendla.description: A withered white rose, cream-colored petals stained by irremovable traces of deep red, reflecting certain recollections of her past life. Bygones are bygones, and there is so little she can hold onto.
p_char_494_vendla.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vendela.

p_char_499_kaitou.name: Diamante's Token
p_char_499_kaitou.description: A simple gemstone magnifying glass that has seen many years of use. Find the traces of forgery, and identify my true nature.
p_char_499_kaitou.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Diamante.

p_char_4109_baslin.name: Bassline's Token
p_char_4109_baslin.description: The mouthpiece of a tuba. Bassline has rubbed it clean and restored its former sheen.
p_char_4109_baslin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bassline.

p_char_194_leto.name: Leto's Token
p_char_194_leto.description: A bottle of honey beverage, emblematic of the taste of home. The moment Leto hands you this, she's gonna tell you 'chug.'
p_char_194_leto.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leto.

p_char_4114_harold.name: Harold's Token
p_char_4114_harold.description: A bottle of discerningly selected perfume. From what goes into it to how to use it, Harold has explained each aspect to you in laborious enough detail to drive one up the wall.
p_char_4114_harold.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Harold.

p_char_4081_warmy.name: Warmy's Token
p_char_4081_warmy.description: A tiny little freight truck, made out of a candy wrapper. For each Rim Billy sweet you've given Warmy in your journey, she's transformed it and gifted it back to you.
p_char_4081_warmy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Warmy.

p_char_4119_wanqin.name: Wanqing's Token
p_char_4119_wanqin.description: An exquisite model of a Tianshi apparatus, reportedly sold in limited runs by the Tianshi Bureaus to great fanfare among the children of Yan. Variations of 'you'd better study hard if you want one' ring in the ears of every Yanese child.
p_char_4119_wanqin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Wanqing.

p_char_4122_grabds.name: Grain Buds's Token
p_char_4122_grabds.description: A handmade bamboo flute. Pure and clear of timbre, but the tuning is mildly suspect.
p_char_4122_grabds.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Grain Buds.

p_char_4023_rfalcn.name: Kestrel's Token
p_char_4023_rfalcn.description: A rustic scimitar. Regarding you as a friend in arms, the tribal warrior of Sargon gifts you this.
p_char_4023_rfalcn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kestrel.

p_char_4124_iana.name: Iana's Token
p_char_4124_iana.description: Contact lenses for everyday use. Does not endow you with the power of Gemini, but things do seem to look a little sharper.
p_char_4124_iana.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Iana.

p_char_4125_rdoc.name: Doc's Token
p_char_4125_rdoc.description: A shotgun shell. He regrets that the conflict had to be resolved that way, but he did not hesitate, not when even more lives were at stake.
p_char_4125_rdoc.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Doc.

p_char_4126_fuze.name: Fuze's Token
p_char_4126_fuze.description: An unusual helmet. You often wonder what his expression is behind the mask.
p_char_4126_fuze.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fuze.

p_char_446_aroma.name: Aroma's Token
p_char_446_aroma.description: An appointment form for cleaning services, with a list of different scented detergents and their respective use cases. Call her when you need her, and she'll know which one will leave you a happy customer.
p_char_446_aroma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aroma.

p_char_4131_odda.name: Odda's Token
p_char_4131_odda.description: A sweet potato roasted in a pile of fallen leaves. Very hottake care when holding.
p_char_4131_odda.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Odda.

p_char_1036_fang2.name: Fang the Fire-Sharpened's Token
p_char_1036_fang2.description: A big ol' windbreaker. Gotta keep the wind out and stay warm while you're active in the wilderness.
p_char_1036_fang2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fang the Fire-Sharpened.

p_char_4079_haini.name: Lucilla's Token
p_char_4079_haini.description: A hand-made coupon. She has so many ideas that she could not decide on what to gift; she makes something on the spot based on her mood at the time when you redeem the coupon.
p_char_4079_haini.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lucilla.

p_char_4137_udflow.name: Underflow's Token
p_char_4137_udflow.description: A simple metal folder that automatically sorts documents based on rules set by the user. Underflow seems to want you to use it for the reports she submits.
p_char_4137_udflow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Underflow.

p_char_4147_mitm.name: Mitm's Token
p_char_4147_mitm.description: Dessert coupon that gives 50% off on the second serving. Mitm was very insistent that you bring him along when you use this coupon.
p_char_4147_mitm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mitm.

p_char_4151_tinman.name: Tin Man's Token
p_char_4151_tinman.description: An entirely unremarkable nut. You keep looking back and forth towards it and Tin Man, trying to figure out where it fell from.
p_char_4151_tinman.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tin Man.

p_char_4140_lasher.name: Sand Reckoner's Token
p_char_4140_lasher.description: A clockwork fowlbeast that picks up shiny stuff. It has a sharp eye like its maker, but your office is not any tidier for it.
p_char_4140_lasher.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sand Reckoner.

p_char_4139_papyrs.name: Papyrus's Token
p_char_4139_papyrs.description: A copy of 'Tentative Travel Plans (Third Edition).' Her travels began with an encounter with Rhodes Island. Wish her a smooth journey.
p_char_4139_papyrs.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Papyrus.

p_char_103_angel.name: Exusiai's Token
p_char_103_angel.description: A Best Boss medal. Collect five of these to exchange for a Super Boss medal.
p_char_103_angel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Exusiai.

p_char_112_siege.name: Siege's Token
p_char_112_siege.description: A large, hard rivet. Made by workers in Londinium, it will return to its homeland in the end.
p_char_112_siege.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Siege.

p_char_134_ifrit.name: Ifrit's Token
p_char_134_ifrit.description: A long novel telling a legendary story. It is badly burned and you can only barely make out the words.
p_char_134_ifrit.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ifrit.

p_char_180_amgoat.name: Eyjafjalla's Token
p_char_180_amgoat.description: A small pair of scissors. The handle is carefully wrapped in heat-resistant cloth.
p_char_180_amgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla.

p_char_291_aglina.name: Angelina's Token
p_char_291_aglina.description: A lime flavored lip balm. The wind in the wilds is as dry as the nights in the city.
p_char_291_aglina.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Angelina.

p_char_147_shining.name: Shining's Token
p_char_147_shining.description: A white pendant. It looks normal, but it cannot be stained by dust.
p_char_147_shining.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shining.

p_char_179_cgbird.name: Nightingale's Token
p_char_179_cgbird.description: A box of messy puzzles. The real problem is many pieces are missing.
p_char_179_cgbird.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightingale.

p_char_136_hsguma.name: Hoshiguma's Token
p_char_136_hsguma.description: An old manga. It tells the story of an unknown monster becoming a hero with the help of his friends.
p_char_136_hsguma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoshiguma.

p_char_202_demkni.name: Saria's Token
p_char_202_demkni.description: Several security cooperation contracts. Some of them already have a gray calcareous stamp on them.
p_char_202_demkni.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saria.

p_char_172_svrash.name: SilverAsh's Token
p_char_172_svrash.description: One of only a few extant Originium Ice crystals that represent sincerity. It will never melt.
p_char_172_svrash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of SilverAsh.

p_char_263_skadi.name: Skadi's Token
p_char_263_skadi.description: A song written in her mother tongue. Although you can't understand a word of it, she IS going to teach it to you.
p_char_263_skadi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi.

p_char_010_chen.name: Ch'en's Token
p_char_010_chen.description: This thing has been sealed for a long time. She didn't forget it. It's just that she can't bear to touch that rusty point again. Perhaps someday it will burn again.
p_char_010_chen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en.

p_char_340_shwaz.name: Schwarz's Token
p_char_340_shwaz.description: A crossbow. Well maintained and easy to use. But the tiny scratches and dents on it provide some insight into all the killing it has done.
p_char_340_shwaz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Schwarz.

p_char_188_helage.name: Hellagur's Token
p_char_188_helage.description: A thick thread-bound book that will never be lent to anyone else. Its pages describe the decades of war in Ursus, and the dried ink carries a long history of suffering.
p_char_188_helage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hellagur.

p_char_248_mgllan.name: Magallan's Token
p_char_248_mgllan.description: A fossilized branch covered in snow. The mighty tree this came from once spread its roots throughout the land, but this branch is all that remains to tell its story.
p_char_248_mgllan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Magallan.

p_char_213_mostma.name: Mostima's Token
p_char_213_mostma.description: It's her blunderbuss. She doesn't need it anymore.
p_char_213_mostma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mostima.

p_char_225_haak.name: Aak's Token
p_char_225_haak.description: A bottle filled with 6 different-colored pills. No instructions are provided.
p_char_225_haak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aak.

p_char_2014_nian.name: Nian's Token
p_char_2014_nian.description: A simple, antique dagger. Legend holds that if this dagger is ever lifted with an intent to murder, the blade will disappear.
p_char_2014_nian.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nian.

p_char_017_huang.name: Blaze's Token
p_char_017_huang.description: A glass bottle with hard-to-discern contents inside. After being shaken a few times, the bottle heats up, making it perfect for keeping one's hands warm in the winter.
p_char_017_huang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blaze.

p_char_2013_cerber.name: Ceobe's Token
p_char_2013_cerber.description: An origami knife that took a long time to fold. It's crooked, full of extra creases, and rough around the edges. Wonder if the recipient will like it?
p_char_2013_cerber.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceobe.

p_char_222_bpipe.name: Bagpipe's Token
p_char_222_bpipe.description: A handful of quinoa. The land breeds life, and life returns to feed the land.
p_char_222_bpipe.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bagpipe.

p_char_250_phatom.name: Phantom's Token
p_char_250_phatom.description: An old music score. The notes upon the manuscript have long been blurred by the passage of time.
p_char_250_phatom.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Phantom.

p_char_400_weedy.name: Weedy's Token
p_char_400_weedy.description: A sheaf of Bionic Seadragon blueprints. Crammed with helpful annotations from the designer herself, who's written 'even a beckbeast could make one from scratch with this.' And she's probably right.
p_char_400_weedy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Weedy.

p_char_113_cqbw.name: W's Token
p_char_113_cqbw.description: A selfie of W making a peace-sign gesture. In the corner is another white-haired Sarkaz woman who is standing not far away, seemingly talking with others.
p_char_113_cqbw.usage: Used to improve the Potential of W.

p_char_197_poca.name: Rosa's Token
p_char_197_poca.description: A paper cutter. She solemnly handed it to you, but you're not sure why.
p_char_197_poca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosa.

p_char_358_lisa.name: Suzuran's Token
p_char_358_lisa.description: A handful of lily-of-the-valley flowers. When Lisa was asked what she had in mind for her code name, she happened to have her arms around a pot filled with these flowers.
p_char_358_lisa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Suzuran.

p_char_293_thorns.name: Thorns' Token
p_char_293_thorns.description: A small vial of medicinal fluid, a reminder of some of his earliest work; Danger, use with caution.
p_char_293_thorns.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Thorns.

p_char_416_zumama.name: Eunectes' Token
p_char_416_zumama.description: A wrench that seems to been used for a long time. Useful for mechanical manufacturing, or self-defense in a pinch.
p_char_416_zumama.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eunectes.

p_char_350_surtr.name: Surtr's Token
p_char_350_surtr.description: A photocopied document filled with place names, several of which have been crossed out in red. If you have time, you can help scout these locations.
p_char_350_surtr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Surtr.

p_char_423_blemsh.name: Blemishine's Token
p_char_423_blemsh.description: A book of a knight's tale; an absurd legend, legendary absurdity.
p_char_423_blemsh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blemishine.

p_char_391_rosmon.name: Rosmontis' Token
p_char_391_rosmon.description: A plant specimen, delicately made yet still very amateur. She hopes with all her heart that you can help her remember this.
p_char_391_rosmon.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosmontis.

p_char_311_mudrok.name: Mudrock's Token
p_char_311_mudrok.description: A tiny little rock sculpture. It looks like it's 'gazing' at you inquisitively.
p_char_311_mudrok.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mudrock.

p_char_264_f12yin.name: Mountain's Token
p_char_264_f12yin.description: A fine grape wine, all wrapped up. Its place of origin appears to be a very famed Columbian winery; we don't know by what means he obtained it.
p_char_264_f12yin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mountain.

p_char_332_archet.name: Archetto's Token
p_char_332_archet.description: A Monastery limited commemoration badge. Meant to be bought, but just call this one a gift of friendship!
p_char_332_archet.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Archetto.

p_char_2015_dusk.name: Dusk's Token
p_char_2015_dusk.description: A seemingly ordinary brush. Dusk's brushes can give rise to all life as well as brushstrokes. Be a little careful when using it.
p_char_2015_dusk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dusk.

p_char_362_saga.name: Saga's Token
p_char_362_saga.description: A wooden fish she carved by herself. When on edge, just chant the sutras with her.
p_char_362_saga.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saga.

p_char_456_ash.name: Ash's Token
p_char_456_ash.description: A postcard, upon which is a proverb written in letters you've never seen before. It seems to say, 'the only thing that comes from waiting is old age.'
p_char_456_ash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ash.

p_char_472_pasngr.name: Passenger's Token
p_char_472_pasngr.description: An ancient Sargon gold coin. Sent to and fro by the long hands of fate, it now belongs to you.
p_char_472_pasngr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Passenger.

p_char_1012_skadi2.name: Skadi the Corrupting Heart's Token
p_char_1012_skadi2.description: A curved quill formed of cartilage. A light blue liquid drips from the quill's point, violently transforming an experimental organism's physiological structure.
p_char_1012_skadi2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi the Corrupting Heart.

p_char_003_kalts.name: Kal'tsit's Token
p_char_003_kalts.description: An unusual pocket watch, of a format never before seen in any country. Engraved on it are four dates across as many years, as well as a few crooked letters.
p_char_003_kalts.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kal'tsit.

p_char_474_glady.name: Gladiia's Token
p_char_474_glady.description: A small, black device of incomprehensible makeup. The three buttons on it seem to respectively be a knife, a skull and some sort of design of a creature, and don't quite scream to be pushed.
p_char_474_glady.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gladiia.

p_char_426_billro.name: Carnelian's Token
p_char_426_billro.description: A small souvenir collected by travelers. She's spoken of the place she bought this souvenir having such good views, and that next time, she'll take you with her to see them.
p_char_426_billro.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Carnelian.

p_char_485_pallas.name: Pallas's Token
p_char_485_pallas.description: A Minos hero's epic. 'The hero came from the commoners, and returned to amongst the commoners.' This line, at the head of the poem, has been circled.
p_char_485_pallas.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pallas.

p_char_1013_chen2.name: Ch'en the Holungday's Token
p_char_1013_chen2.description: A notebook, densely packed with Ch'en's records of her investigation in Dossoles, and a few of her thoughts. She seems to be implying she's seeking your opinions, though of course, she hasn't said that outright.
p_char_1013_chen2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en the Holungday.

p_char_437_mizuki.name: Mizuki's Token
p_char_437_mizuki.description: One of some classic video game's commemoration badges distributed for its 40th anniversary. The characters that appear on them each have completely different expressions, and are so cute you could just open wide and
p_char_437_mizuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mizuki.

p_char_430_fartth.name: Fartooth's Token
p_char_430_fartth.description: A rough, handmade piccolo. Fartooth made it herself, and it is capable of producing a few simple sounds. The craftsmanship was simple, so the prickly splinters have been meticulously smoothed over.
p_char_430_fartth.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fartooth.

p_char_479_sleach.name: Saileach's Token
p_char_479_sleach.description: A small segment of a dried willow branch. Each bud is still perfectly intact, as if it could grow once more if dipped into water.
p_char_479_sleach.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saileach.

p_char_1014_nearl2.name: Nearl the Radiant Knight's Token
p_char_1014_nearl2.description: A Kazimierzian knightly coat of arms, restored to splendor. After a meticulous polishing, the pegasuss golden wings give off an awe-inspiring glow.
p_char_1014_nearl2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nearl the Radiant Knight.

p_char_420_flamtl.name: Flametail's Token
p_char_420_flamtl.description: A seemingly mundane Kazimierzian coin. This was the sole reward Sona earned from her first victory in the underground arena.
p_char_420_flamtl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flametail.

p_char_206_gnosis.name: Gnosis's Token
p_char_206_gnosis.description: A self-defense dagger he forged after his arrival at Rhodes Island. You only found out far later, by pure chance, that this is one of the ways the Edelweisses show their friendship.
p_char_206_gnosis.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gnosis.

p_char_322_lmlee.name: Lee's Token
p_char_322_lmlee.description: A ring-shaped jade pendant of unassuming appearance. You're unable to judge its value.
p_char_322_lmlee.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lee.

p_char_377_gdglow.name: Goldenglow's Token
p_char_377_gdglow.description:
A bottle of unique body lotion. You hear it's effective in reducing static shock once applied.
Even if it's a bust, at least it's good for your skin.
p_char_377_gdglow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Goldenglow.

p_char_2023_ling.name: Ling's Token
p_char_2023_ling.description: A lantern. You're absolutely sure you once saw this in some late-night dream. Lanterns light the eve, arrows fall as rain, the desert flared with fire.
p_char_2023_ling.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ling.

p_char_300_phenxi.name: Fiammetta's Token
p_char_300_phenxi.description:
A bullet-shaped hazelnut lollipop. An unofficial ration of the Laterano Notarial Hall.
Supposedly the Pope's favorite, although he claims all Lateran treats as his favorite.
p_char_300_phenxi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fiammetta.

p_char_4039_horn.name: Horn's Token
p_char_4039_horn.description: A notebook. The names of several musical instruments are fastidiously written on the first page. What she's sharing with you is intel, but at the same time, memories.
p_char_4039_horn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Horn.

p_char_1023_ghost2.name: Specter the Unchained's Token
p_char_1023_ghost2.description: A detail-rich sculpture. Artwork only possesses meaning when left in the hands of those who know to appreciate it.
p_char_1023_ghost2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Specter the Unchained.

p_char_4009_irene.name: Irene's Token
p_char_4009_irene.description: A small chunk of ochre reef, having undergone centuries of baptism upon Iberia's coastline before being handed to you.
p_char_4009_irene.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Irene.

p_char_4042_lumen.name: Lumen's Token
p_char_4042_lumen.description: A simple light-emitting unit, employing some fascinating technologies. The handiwork of Lumen in his spare time. You hear the theory behind it comes from the lighthouse research notes left by his parents.
p_char_4042_lumen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lumen.

p_char_4046_ebnhlz.name: Ebenholz's Token
p_char_4046_ebnhlz.description: A Leithanian coin with a crudely drilled hole in its center. Only he knows how much sweat and tears were poured into that hole when a skilled artisan would have been able to make it effortlessly.
p_char_4046_ebnhlz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ebenholz.

p_char_4048_doroth.name: Dorothy's Token
p_char_4048_doroth.description: A tube of unknown reagent identical to what flows in her body. Must never be used.
p_char_4048_doroth.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dorothy.

p_char_1026_gvial2.name: Gavial the Invincible's Token
p_char_1026_gvial2.description: An excessively dense alloy dumbbell, while appearing deceptively liftable. Gavial neglected to tell you its weight when she gave it to you, and you had to spend half an hour soothing your poor, pulled back.
p_char_1026_gvial2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gavial the Invincible.

p_char_4055_bgsnow.name: Pozmka's Token
p_char_4055_bgsnow.description: A pile of manuscript paper. Her strength and cowardice are written within in their fullest, nothing withheld.
p_char_4055_bgsnow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pozmka.

p_char_4064_mlynar.name: Mynar's Token
p_char_4064_mlynar.description: A letter opener of classical design, having opened up the joys and sorrows of hundreds of lives. It's been close to the sharpest thing he's held for a long, long time.
p_char_4064_mlynar.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mynar.

p_char_4072_ironmn.name: Stainless's Token
p_char_4072_ironmn.description: Brand new zipline equipment. The parts that come in contact with the body are softer than on mass-produced ziplines, guarding against friction burns that might occur during high-speed movement.
p_char_4072_ironmn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Stainless.

p_char_1028_texas2.name: Texas the Omertosa's Token
p_char_1028_texas2.description: A necklace of rather Siracusan stylings. As introduced to us by Texas, it is in fact a token of Signora Sicilia's. Possess it, and you possess the right to meet her. We pray the day never comes when it's needed.
p_char_1028_texas2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Texas the Omertosa.

p_char_4065_judge.name: Penance's Token
p_char_4065_judge.description: A solid wooden gavel. The lighter it feels when you pick it up, the more you feel its weight when you strike it.
p_char_4065_judge.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Penance.

p_char_1020_reed2.name: Reed the Flame Shadow's Token
p_char_1020_reed2.description: A poetry anthology transcribed in an unfamiliar language. She does not seek for all to understand itshe simply hopes there will be a corner to reside in, for those who wish to read these poems.
p_char_1020_reed2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Reed the Flame Shadow.

p_char_4080_lin.name: Lin's Token
p_char_4080_lin.description: A delicate, detailed hourglass, the glass sparkling, the sand of finest grain. Time passes through overturnings and upheavals, but some things never change.
p_char_4080_lin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lin.

p_char_2024_chyue.name: Chongyue's Token
p_char_2024_chyue.description: A visitation card. It was the first time he learned that mankind regarded battle as so infused with ceremony. At this point, he no longer remembers who won or lost that bout.
p_char_2024_chyue.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chongyue.

p_char_4082_qiubai.name: Qiubai's Token
p_char_4082_qiubai.description: An ordinary whetstone. Those most common of stones, found upon the mounts and by the rivers, become smooth and sleek by the sharpening of sword's edges.
p_char_4082_qiubai.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Qiubai.

p_char_1029_yato2.name: Kirin R Yato's Token
p_char_1029_yato2.description: A never-before-seen whetstone. Ever since you two met ages ago, Yato has never stopped to temper herself for even a moment.
p_char_1029_yato2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kirin R Yato.

p_char_4087_ines.name: Ines's Token
p_char_4087_ines.description: A sharp, unassuming embroidery needle. Ines does not need anything eye-catching to prove her identity. This pointed yet lackluster object is her most appropriate justification.
p_char_4087_ines.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ines.

p_char_249_mlyss.name: Muelsyse's Token
p_char_249_mlyss.description: A tiny figurine formed of water droplets, shaped like Muelsyse herself. So long as the reaction between you two remains, it will never dissipate.
p_char_249_mlyss.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Muelsyse.

p_char_4027_heyak.name: Ho'olheyak's Token
p_char_4027_heyak.description: A beautifully-designed history book. Each and every page is jampacked with her notes. By understanding history, you bring yourself closer to her.
p_char_4027_heyak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ho'olheyak.

p_char_1031_slent2.name: Silence the Paradigmatic's Token
p_char_1031_slent2.description: A pair of somewhat antiquated-looking round glasses. Some have told her that they make her look less courageous. As such, she decided to entrust her glasses to you. Aboard Rhodes Island, she wants to be her past self.
p_char_1031_slent2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Silence the Paradigmatic.

p_char_1032_excu2.name: Executor the Ex Foedere's Token
p_char_1032_excu2.description: A wireless earpiece. The latest of the Lateran Curia's tech products, and the same model that Executor himself currently uses. Is he giving this to you so you can stay in contact with him at any time, perhaps?
p_char_1032_excu2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Executor the Ex Foedere.

p_char_2012_typhon.name: Typhon's Token
p_char_2012_typhon.description: A bottle of pungently aromatic plant extract. A scent to smother civilization. Blend into the wilds; become the hunter, and become her companion.
p_char_2012_typhon.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Typhon.

p_char_1033_swire2.name: Swire the Elegant Wit's Token
p_char_1033_swire2.description: A glinting, glittering gold coin. Heavy, oppressively lustrous, fabulously pure. Put it in your palm to admire, and out falls... a secret fluorescent flashbang! A self-defense gift from her to you.
p_char_1033_swire2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Swire the Elegant Wit.

p_char_1016_agoat2.name: Eyjafjalla the Hvt Aska's Token
p_char_1016_agoat2.description: A small and light piece of volcanic rock that tumbles about floating and sinking once dropped in water, gently fizzing away without end. This is the very song of Life.
p_char_1016_agoat2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla the Hvt Aska.

p_char_1034_jesca2.name: Jessica the Liberated's Token
p_char_1034_jesca2.description: A custom-ordered laser scope, used for precision nighttime aiming. She always has her sights set dead ahead, and never looks away.
p_char_1034_jesca2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jessica the Liberated.

p_char_4088_hodrer.name: Hoederer's Token
p_char_4088_hodrer.description: A notebook with a singed corner. Recorded are not only operation results, but the lives of Sarkaz, sifted from the ashes.
p_char_4088_hodrer.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoederer.

p_char_4098_vvana.name: Viviana's Token
p_char_4098_vvana.description: A dried marigold bookmark. A book's journey is long and far; let it mark a temporary repose, the place to return to after stepping away.
p_char_4098_vvana.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Viviana.

p_char_245_cello.name: Virtuosa's Token
p_char_245_cello.description: A pair of black gloves made from fine materials, bringing calm to the instrument's strings, and to the restless sounds of the heart.
p_char_245_cello.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Virtuosa.

p_char_4116_blkkgt.name: Degenbrecher's Token
p_char_4116_blkkgt.description: A comms terminal that can only reach her number. Doesn't look any different to a regular comms terminal, but provides infinitely more relief.
p_char_4116_blkkgt.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Degenbrecher.

p_char_4117_ray.name: Ray's Token
p_char_4117_ray.description: A scrapbook, author's intent indiscernible. The 'cryptid photo' inside seems like a collaged stitch jobshould somebody tell her?
p_char_4117_ray.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ray.

p_char_2025_shu.name: Shu's Token
p_char_2025_shu.description: An ancient illustration reflecting the principles on which the seasons revolve, as imagined by those a millennium ago. May time drift on and turn the age; it is this still that stays the same.
p_char_2025_shu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shu.

p_char_4121_zuole.name: Zuo Le's Token
p_char_4121_zuole.description: A crafted kite of distinctly Yanese make, still carrying the scent of the leaves in the trees. While the clumsy hands of its flier often cause it to fall, it will always come to rise again on the wind.
p_char_4121_zuole.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Zuo Le.

p_char_4123_ela.name: Ela's Token
p_char_4123_ela.description: A set of goggles and noise-canceling earphones. She was not sure whether you needed the goggles at one point.
p_char_4123_ela.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ela.

p_char_4132_ascln.name: Ascalon's Token
p_char_4132_ascln.description: A tiny glass phial filled with smoke. Shatter with your fingers when danger looms, and Ascalon will be by your side.
p_char_4132_ascln.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ascalon.

p_char_1035_wisdel.name: Wi'adel's Token
p_char_1035_wisdel.description: A grenade with a smiley face scrawled on. You have no clue when this appeared in your hand. Okay, optimism: maybe it's just a beautiful firework waiting to blossom.
p_char_1035_wisdel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Wi'adel.

p_char_4133_logos.name: Logos's Token
p_char_4133_logos.description: A 1:1 scale replica bone pen. Useless for incanting. Very useful for copying down Rhodes Island's list of incantation victims.
p_char_4133_logos.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Logos.

p_char_4134_cetsyr.name: Civilight Eterna's Token
p_char_4134_cetsyr.description: A promise to continue journeying with Rhodes Island; the only thing she can give you now. You know she'll keep her word.
p_char_4134_cetsyr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Civilight Eterna.

p_char_4145_ulpia.name: Ulpianus's Token
p_char_4145_ulpia.description: A rock taken from a reef that has been sculpted into the shape of an anchor. The patterns etched upon it seem to represent musical notes.
p_char_4145_ulpia.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ulpianus.

p_char_4146_nymph.name: Nymph's Token
p_char_4146_nymph.description: A stamp in the shape of a heart, able to make complex patterns. Nymph calls it 'Heart to Heart.'
p_char_4146_nymph.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nymph.

p_char_4138_narant.name: Narantuya's Token
p_char_4138_narant.description: A homemade sleeping elixir, which came from the myriad plants of the jungle and the bandit's extensive outdoor survival experience. She sincerely hopes that you will be a good companion to her, and that her presence won't cause you to be plagued by nightmares.
p_char_4138_narant.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Narantuya.

p_char_4058_pepe.name: Pepe's Token
p_char_4058_pepe.description: An expensive lotus brooch. Do not sell it, for what it represents is far more valuable than its material.
p_char_4058_pepe.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pepe.

class_p_char_123_fang.name: Fang's Kernel Token
class_p_char_123_fang.description: A pair of running shoes that fit your feet perfectly. The person who gave you this must have spent a lot of effort asking you to join her on her morning exercise routine.
class_p_char_123_fang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fang.

class_p_char_240_wyvern.name: Vanilla's Kernel Token
class_p_char_240_wyvern.description: A wild animal map of the Vouivre Boundary Grassland. The marks on it are disappearing one after another as the engines of mobile cities roar.
class_p_char_240_wyvern.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vanilla.

class_p_char_192_falco.name: Plume's Kernel Token
class_p_char_192_falco.description: A formal hat decorated with a modest amount of feathers. It is suitable for all Laterano festivals.
class_p_char_192_falco.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Plume.

class_p_char_208_melan.name: Melantha's Kernel Token
class_p_char_208_melan.description: Simply wrapped candles. The special fragrance they emit is unforgettable.
class_p_char_208_melan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Melantha.

class_p_char_209_ardign.name: Cardigan's Kernel Token
class_p_char_209_ardign.description: A sled made of hard wood. It makes you look forward to seeing snow.
class_p_char_209_ardign.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cardigan.

class_p_char_122_beagle.name: Beagle's Kernel Token
class_p_char_122_beagle.description: Transcripts neatly placed inside a folder. They all show straight A's.
class_p_char_122_beagle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beagle.

class_p_char_124_kroos.name: Kroos's Kernel Token
class_p_char_124_kroos.description: A collection of shooting toys, including a plastic bow, several sucker arrows and an apple to be used as a target.
class_p_char_124_kroos.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kroos.

class_p_char_121_lava.name: Lava's Kernel Token
class_p_char_121_lava.description: A specially processed sheath. It is covered in deliberately mysterious patterns.
class_p_char_121_lava.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lava.

class_p_char_120_hibisc.name: Hibiscus's Kernel Token
class_p_char_120_hibisc.description: A daily schedule custom made for your own healthy living. To be honest, it's hard to reject it.
class_p_char_120_hibisc.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hibiscus.

class_p_char_212_ansel.name: Ansel's Kernel Token
class_p_char_212_ansel.description: A portable blood pressure meter. Hope you can take good care of yourself even without a medic around.
class_p_char_212_ansel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ansel.

class_p_char_210_stward.name: Steward's Kernel Token
class_p_char_210_stward.description: A trendy sport armlet. Looks like it's a simple version with only one color.
class_p_char_210_stward.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Steward.

class_p_char_278_orchid.name: Orchid's Kernel Token
class_p_char_278_orchid.description: A delicate pen that has been lovingly packaged. It feels like working in a office building when you use it to review documents.
class_p_char_278_orchid.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Orchid.

class_p_char_282_catap.name: Catapult's Kernel Token
class_p_char_282_catap.description: A nameplate worn only by soldiers. Now that she is free, she has handed over her glory to you.
class_p_char_282_catap.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Catapult.

class_p_char_283_midn.name: Midnight's Kernel Token
class_p_char_283_midn.description: A delicate goblet. Under the yellow light, it gives off intoxicating colors.
class_p_char_283_midn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Midnight.

class_p_char_284_spot.name: Spot's Kernel Token
class_p_char_284_spot.description: A slang dictionary. It tells how to be gently sarcastic in the languages of several countries.
class_p_char_284_spot.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Spot.

class_p_char_281_popka.name: Popukar's Kernel Token
class_p_char_281_popka.description: A solid metal toy. It's particularly heavy and hard to destroy.
class_p_char_281_popka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Popukar.

class_p_char_141_nights.name: Haze's Kernel Token
class_p_char_141_nights.description: A serving spoon. Its companion fork has been hidden inside a book.
class_p_char_141_nights.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Haze.

class_p_char_109_fmout.name: Gitano's Kernel Token
class_p_char_109_fmout.description: A card from a divination deck. Although you already know its meaning, you make your own future.
class_p_char_109_fmout.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gitano.

class_p_char_235_jesica.name: Jessica's Kernel Token
class_p_char_235_jesica.description: A photo commemorating Jessica's entry into Blacksteel. It represents the start of a new life.
class_p_char_235_jesica.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jessica.

class_p_char_126_shotst.name: Meteor's Kernel Token
class_p_char_126_shotst.description: A garland made of twigs that seem to never wither. The forest of Kazimierz is asking in a low voice when its guardian will return.
class_p_char_126_shotst.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteor.

class_p_char_118_yuki.name: Shirayuki's Kernel Token
class_p_char_118_yuki.description: A calligraphic work whose ink has not yet dried. It's a blessing for Rhodes Island.
class_p_char_118_yuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shirayuki.

class_p_char_149_scave.name: Scavenger's Kernel Token
class_p_char_149_scave.description: A silver coin. Maybe you can use it to decide something important.
class_p_char_149_scave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scavenger.

class_p_char_290_vigna.name: Vigna's Kernel Token
class_p_char_290_vigna.description: An electric guitar for daily practice. A request to take it onto the battlefield was denied.
class_p_char_290_vigna.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vigna.

class_p_char_130_doberm.name: Dobermann's Kernel Token
class_p_char_130_doberm.description: A red pamphlet. It records a tough battle.
class_p_char_130_doberm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dobermann.

class_p_char_289_gyuki.name: Matoimaru's Kernel Token
class_p_char_289_gyuki.description: A pair of soft blinders. It's nice to put it on at bedtime.
class_p_char_289_gyuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matoimaru.

class_p_char_193_frostl.name: Frostleaf's Kernel Token
class_p_char_193_frostl.description: A vocabulary book that looks timeworn due to overuse. Detailed marks that look like doodles fill the margins of every page.
class_p_char_193_frostl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Frostleaf.

class_p_char_185_frncat.name: Mousse's Kernel Token
class_p_char_185_frncat.description: An album whose cover is decorated with golden floral patterns. The photos inside record the 'kitties' that played with the photographer. Kitties!
class_p_char_185_frncat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mousse.

class_p_char_237_gravel.name: Gravel's Kernel Token
class_p_char_237_gravel.description: A badly worn Kazimierz knight badge. No matter what happened in the past, seizing the here and now is what really matters.
class_p_char_237_gravel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gravel.

class_p_char_236_rope.name: Rope's Kernel Token
class_p_char_236_rope.description: An expensive ornament whose price tag is still on it. Is it really okay to take it...?
class_p_char_236_rope.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rope.

class_p_char_117_myrrh.name: Myrrh's Kernel Token
class_p_char_117_myrrh.description: A pill made from multiple herbs. It will come in handy when you fall ill. Besides, every pill is carefully coated.
class_p_char_117_myrrh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrrh.

class_p_char_181_flower.name: Perfumer's Kernel Token
class_p_char_181_flower.description: A double ear vase in the style of the Minos civilization. The owner must regularly replace the old flowers with new ones.
class_p_char_181_flower.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Perfumer.

class_p_char_199_yak.name: Matterhorn's Kernel Token
class_p_char_199_yak.description: A wooden statue that looks a bit rough. It is lowering its head, which gives a peaceful impression.
class_p_char_199_yak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matterhorn.

class_p_char_150_snakek.name: Cuora's Kernel Token
class_p_char_150_snakek.description: A normal baseball bat bearing the illegible autographs of several famous players on it. Maybe, perhaps, those signatures are fake, but the desire to share them is real.
class_p_char_150_snakek.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cuora.

class_p_char_196_sunbr.name: Gummy's Kernel Token
class_p_char_196_sunbr.description: A discount coupon for Gummy's Breakfast Kitchen. Does -100% mean it's free...?
class_p_char_196_sunbr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gummy.

class_p_char_110_deepcl.name: Deepcolor's Kernel Token
class_p_char_110_deepcl.description: A freehand fairy tale storybook. The main character, after traveling between life and death, finally steps into the river at the end.
class_p_char_110_deepcl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Deepcolor.

class_p_char_183_skgoat.name: Earthspirit's Kernel Token
class_p_char_183_skgoat.description: A small piece of weirdly-shaped ore. Put it beside your ear to hear the low sounds of a liquid.
class_p_char_183_skgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Earthspirit.

class_p_char_277_sqrrel.name: Shaw's Kernel Token
class_p_char_277_sqrrel.description: A stamp album. In the past, the owner never let anyone touch her precious collection.
class_p_char_277_sqrrel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shaw.

class_p_char_137_brownb.name: Beehunter's Kernel Token
class_p_char_137_brownb.description: A boxing trophy. The named carved on the base is already worn, but the trophy itself still emits a prideful light.
class_p_char_137_brownb.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beehunter.

class_p_char_253_greyy.name: Greyy's Kernel Token
class_p_char_253_greyy.description: A delicate LED lamp. Embed 1 Originium Shard and it will shine forever. Let it dispel the anxiety brought by darkness.
class_p_char_253_greyy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Greyy.

class_p_char_298_susuro.name: Sussurro's Kernel Token
class_p_char_298_susuro.description: A diary made from soft paper. Whether the words record the past or the future, it will always be there as long as it's recorded, right?
class_p_char_298_susuro.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sussurro.

class_p_char_151_myrtle.name: Myrtle's Kernel Token
class_p_char_151_myrtle.description: A long rod that she chose herself, but it doesn't seem any different from the stick in her hand. She looks to be pretty satisfied with this gift, even though it doesn't have any particular use.
class_p_char_151_myrtle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrtle.

class_p_char_190_clour.name: Vermeil's Kernel Token
class_p_char_190_clour.description: A pearly-white string of trophies carved from animal, including one from the beast that took her arm.
class_p_char_190_clour.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vermeil.

class_p_char_133_mm.name: May's Kernel Token
class_p_char_133_mm.description: It's not clear where this taser came from. It can be grouped with May's other commonly-used weapons.
class_p_char_133_mm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of May.

class_p_char_302_glaze.name: Ambriel's Kernel Token
class_p_char_302_glaze.description: A mirror with exquisite craftsmanship. It is easy to carry, letting you make sure that your hair isn't getting messed up in the heat of battle.
class_p_char_302_glaze.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ambriel.

class_p_char_337_utage.name: Utage's Kernel Token
class_p_char_337_utage.description: A black box. Inside it is another black box. Inside that is another black box. Inside that is... a manicure set?!
class_p_char_337_utage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Utage.

class_p_char_301_cutter.name: Cutter's Kernel Token
class_p_char_301_cutter.description: A hand-carved talisman full of notch marks from when the maker accidentally applied too much force.
class_p_char_301_cutter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cutter.

class_p_char_258_podego.name: Podenco's Kernel Token
class_p_char_258_podego.description: A pack of flower seeds, capable of transforming your office into a flowery sanctuary. As long as you're not allergic to anything, anywhere can become the Convalescent Garden.
class_p_char_258_podego.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Podenco.

class_p_char_328_cammou.name: Click's Kernel Token
class_p_char_328_cammou.description: A compact disc full of popular videos produced by Click in recent years. Contains highlights and uncut content, with some entirely unedited videos.
class_p_char_328_cammou.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Click.

class_p_char_272_strong.name: Jaye's Kernel Token
class_p_char_272_strong.description: A kitchen knife forged from stainless steel. Probably cost quite a lot of money.
class_p_char_272_strong.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jaye.

class_p_char_366_acdrop.name: Aciddrop's Kernel Token
class_p_char_366_acdrop.description: A brand new skateboard that she gifted you, along with bandages and some disinfectant.
class_p_char_366_acdrop.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aciddrop.

class_p_char_271_spikes.name: Arene's Kernel Token
class_p_char_271_spikes.description: A rubber toy bullet. Sankta children keep their own toy guns and fill their pockets with these rubber bullets.
class_p_char_271_spikes.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Arene.

class_p_char_381_bubble.name: Bubble's Kernel Token
class_p_char_381_bubble.description: A stump dug up from outside the city. She doesn't know what to do with it either, but she thought you'd like it, so she dug it up for you.
class_p_char_381_bubble.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bubble.

class_p_char_347_jaksel.name: Jackie's Kernel Token
class_p_char_347_jaksel.description: A pair of brand new sneakers. She's very, VERY looking forward to working out with you.
class_p_char_347_jaksel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jackie.

class_p_char_440_pinecn.name: Pinecone's Kernel Token
class_p_char_440_pinecn.description: A very heavy toolbag, including a back-up nailgun, many spare parts, and a small figurine she's forgotten in there.
class_p_char_440_pinecn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pinecone.

class_p_char_452_bstalk.name: Beanstalk's Kernel Token
class_p_char_452_bstalk.description: An exchange certificate for a pet Metal Crab. After the breeder pledges and stamps, and once the Beanstalk Breeding Company is officially established, this certificate can be exchanged for the adoption of an adorable baby Metal Crab.
class_p_char_452_bstalk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beanstalk.

class_p_char_469_indigo.name: Indigo's Kernel Token
class_p_char_469_indigo.description: A beautiful glowskater. Its faint light can illuminate all throughout the night. By the next day, you're free to let it go.
class_p_char_469_indigo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Indigo.

class_p_char_484_robrta.name: Roberta's Kernel Token
class_p_char_484_robrta.description: A makeup brush of rough craftsmanship. Though it shows signs of age, each brown bristle is clean and very soft.
class_p_char_484_robrta.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Roberta.

class_p_char_4041_chnut.name: Chestnut's Kernel Token
class_p_char_4041_chnut.description: Due to how hard they are to grow, this cluster of fluorescent subterranean mushrooms remains miniscule. But still, it represents home.
class_p_char_4041_chnut.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chestnut.

class_p_char_4062_totter.name: Totter's Kernel Token
class_p_char_4062_totter.description: A chunk of firewood frozen absolutely solid. Needs a perfunctory baking to remove moisture content before it can be thrown in the furnace.
class_p_char_4062_totter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Totter.

class_p_char_491_humus.name: Humus's Kernel Token
class_p_char_491_humus.description: A stained self-made hammer-drill. Can be used to drill holes and tighten screws, as well as against people when left without a choice.
class_p_char_491_humus.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Humus.

class_p_char_4107_vrdant.name: Verdant's Kernel Token
class_p_char_4107_vrdant.description: A stalk of grass one could mistake for a weed at first glance. Holds a special significance to him. A sharp notch has been cut in the grass's bladedon't worry, he's not trying to hurt you.
class_p_char_4107_vrdant.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Verdant.

class_p_char_128_plosis.name: Ptilopsis's Kernel Token
class_p_char_128_plosis.description: A reference book which tells how to recognize and use Originium Arts. Most Operators don't understand it.
class_p_char_128_plosis.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ptilopsis.

class_p_char_115_headbr.name: Zima's Kernel Token
class_p_char_115_headbr.description: A strip of cloth ripped from a red flag. When you tie it to your arm, you will somehow feel sad.
class_p_char_115_headbr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Zima.

class_p_char_102_texas.name: Texas's Kernel Token
class_p_char_102_texas.description: The scutcheon of Texas's family. The scratch on it tells a story.
class_p_char_102_texas.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Texas.

class_p_char_106_franka.name: Franka's Kernel Token
class_p_char_106_franka.description: An itinerary. There are too many destinations on it so it's hard to stick to it.
class_p_char_106_franka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Franka.

class_p_char_140_whitew.name: Lappland's Kernel Token
class_p_char_140_whitew.description: Several bloodstained scutcheons with names on them. They represent the leaders of several gangs.
class_p_char_140_whitew.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lappland.

class_p_char_143_ghost.name: Specter's Kernel Token
class_p_char_143_ghost.description: An indescribable painting. The use of negative space is confusing.

class_p_char_129_bluep.name: Blue Poison's Kernel Token
class_p_char_129_bluep.description: A shopping card from a high-class clothing shop. Put away the boring uniforms and enjoy dressing up.
class_p_char_129_bluep.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blue Poison.

class_p_char_204_platnm.name: Platinum's Kernel Token
class_p_char_204_platnm.description: Two tickets to the amusement park. Let's go together this weekend.
class_p_char_204_platnm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Platinum.

class_p_char_219_meteo.name: Meteorite's Kernel Token

class_p_char_219_meteo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteorite.

class_p_char_166_skfire.name: Skyfire's Kernel Token
class_p_char_166_skfire.description: A glass bead that feels cool. The colors inside are raging.
class_p_char_166_skfire.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skyfire.

class_p_char_242_otter.name: Mayer's Kernel Token
class_p_char_242_otter.description: A mini Meeboo model. There is a red button in its belly. Hmm...
class_p_char_242_otter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mayer.

class_p_char_108_silent.name: Silence's Kernel Token
class_p_char_108_silent.description: A patterned feather decoration. This ineloquent researcher from Liberi shows her sincerity by gifting her own feathers.
class_p_char_108_silent.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Silence.

class_p_char_171_bldsk.name: Warfarin's Kernel Token
class_p_char_171_bldsk.description: A mysterious liquid sealed inside a small transparent bottle. Ropy and shiny, this red matter changes its form slowly as you shake the bottle.
class_p_char_171_bldsk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Warfarin.

class_p_char_148_nearl.name: Nearl's Kernel Token
class_p_char_148_nearl.description: An old, discolored Kazimierz knight badge. The Pegasus made of niello is fluttering its wings.
class_p_char_148_nearl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nearl.

class_p_char_144_red.name: Projekt Red's Kernel Token
class_p_char_144_red.description: A pointed baby tooth. Hope you can take good care of it.
class_p_char_144_red.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Projekt Red.

class_p_char_107_liskam.name: Liskarm's Kernel Token
class_p_char_107_liskam.description: A tailor-made insulative bracelet. A safe handshake, finally.
class_p_char_107_liskam.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Liskarm.

class_p_char_201_moeshd.name: Croissant's Kernel Token
class_p_char_201_moeshd.description: A business card with a cute style. Different from normal ones, it has a QR code for receiving money and a remark 'Thank You!'
class_p_char_201_moeshd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Croissant.

class_p_char_145_prove.name: Provence's Kernel Token
class_p_char_145_prove.description: A multifunctional cleaning machine. Most of the time, it is used to clean the hair shed from operators' tails.
class_p_char_145_prove.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Provence.

class_p_char_158_milu.name: Firewatch's Kernel Token
class_p_char_158_milu.description: A simple harmonica. The moment the melodious tweedle sounds, the leaves fall like rain.
class_p_char_158_milu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Firewatch.

class_p_char_173_slchan.name: Cliffheart's Kernel Token
class_p_char_173_slchan.description: A handmade rope ring. Three ropes twine around each other tightly.
class_p_char_173_slchan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cliffheart.

class_p_char_174_slbell.name: Pramanix's Kernel Token
class_p_char_174_slbell.description: A small silver bell. It emits refreshing tinkles when stroked by the breeze.
class_p_char_174_slbell.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pramanix.

class_p_char_195_glassb.name: Istina's Kernel Token
class_p_char_195_glassb.description: A book on the war history of Ursus. It's said the author has been exiled to Leithanien.
class_p_char_195_glassb.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Istina.

class_p_char_101_sora.name: Sora's Kernel Token
class_p_char_101_sora.description: The first single CD Sora released when she debuted as an idol. It is a kids song from a cartoon, but you can still feel she put her heart and soul into it.
class_p_char_101_sora.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sora.

class_p_char_215_mantic.name: Manticore's Kernel Token
class_p_char_215_mantic.description: A violet envelope sealed with a morning glory sticker. Open it and you will find a piece of folded paper saying 'Please be my friend.'
class_p_char_215_mantic.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Manticore.

class_p_char_241_panda.name: FEater's Kernel Token
class_p_char_241_panda.description: A poster of an action movie. The star looks a bit familiar.
class_p_char_241_panda.usage: Used to improve the Potential of FEater.

class_p_char_164_nightm.name: Nightmare's Kernel Token
class_p_char_164_nightm.description: A cute doll commonly seen in shops. It will look different if placed somewhere dark.
class_p_char_164_nightm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightmare.

class_p_char_308_swire.name: Swire's Kernel Token
class_p_char_308_swire.description: A broken police badge. An unknown officer lost it during an important case. No one can tell whose it is, but someone must stand up for justice.
class_p_char_308_swire.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Swire.

class_p_char_326_glacus.name: Glaucus's Kernel Token
class_p_char_326_glacus.description: A dead battery. The final purpose of a useless item is to be part of a collection.
class_p_char_326_glacus.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Glaucus.

class_p_char_274_astesi.name: Astesia's Kernel Token
class_p_char_274_astesi.description: A pen filled with special ink. A thousand stars twinkle brightly the moment the pen touches paper.
class_p_char_274_astesi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Astesia.

class_p_char_279_excu.name: Executor's Kernel Token
class_p_char_279_excu.description: A self-defense manual, with comprehensive descriptions of things to pay attention to in most major city-states. Focuses mostly on personal safety and very little on the well-being of the inhabitants.
class_p_char_279_excu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Executor.

class_p_char_243_waaifu.name: Waai Fu's Kernel Token
class_p_char_243_waaifu.description: An old martial arts scroll written in an undiscernable text. At least it'll have some value as a reference material... right?
class_p_char_243_waaifu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Waai Fu.

class_p_char_261_sddrag.name: Reed's Kernel Token
class_p_char_261_sddrag.description: A short poem written on diary paper. The handwriting is beautiful and delicate, but the words are painful and harrowing.
class_p_char_261_sddrag.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Reed.

class_p_char_356_broca.name: Broca's Kernel Token
class_p_char_356_broca.description: An exquisite miniature landscape model of an ancient Siracusan city. Someone stealthily placed it on your desk at some point, and you didn't discover it until you showed up for work the next day.
class_p_char_356_broca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Broca.

class_p_char_367_swllow.name: GreyThroat's Kernel Token
class_p_char_367_swllow.description: A broken scalpel, the father's memento. It is difficult to imagine that a doctor who did so much to help the Infected would end up suffering so much torment.
class_p_char_367_swllow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of GreyThroat.

class_p_char_226_hmau.name: Hung's Kernel Token
class_p_char_226_hmau.description: A self-authored and compiled cookbook. Its recipes are suitable for any season, featuring dishes that are both easy-to-make and delicious.
class_p_char_226_hmau.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hung.

class_p_char_306_leizi.name: Leizi's Kernel Token
class_p_char_306_leizi.description: An old oak ruler. No ruler markings, no rules.
class_p_char_306_leizi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leizi.

class_p_char_379_sesa.name: Sesa's Kernel Token
class_p_char_379_sesa.description: A pendant etched with runes, its decoration exaggerated and full of obsession with the past.
class_p_char_379_sesa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sesa.

class_p_char_254_vodfox.name: Shamare's Kernel Token
class_p_char_254_vodfox.description: An apple with a bite taken out of it. Small teeth marks are still clearly visible.
class_p_char_254_vodfox.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shamare.

class_p_char_401_elysm.name: Elysium's Kernel Token
class_p_char_401_elysm.description: A complex and hand-drawn topographic map. If you can't make any sense of it, perhaps Elysium would be glad to lead the way.
class_p_char_401_elysm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Elysium.

class_p_char_378_asbest.name: Asbestos's Kernel Token
class_p_char_378_asbest.description: A spare spelunking suit. She seems to be implying that if you have the time, you're free to take a walk with her.
class_p_char_378_asbest.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Asbestos.

class_p_char_343_tknogi.name: Tsukinogi's Kernel Token
class_p_char_343_tknogi.description: A protective charm made by Tsukinogi. Rumors have it that carrying it calms the spirit and dispels the fear of the darkest nights.
class_p_char_343_tknogi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tsukinogi.

class_p_char_373_lionhd.name: Leonhardt's Kernel Token
class_p_char_373_lionhd.description: A pair of trendy limited-edition sneakers. It seems to include a special auxiliary design to accommodate one of Victoria's popular sports, with technical support from Rim Billiton.
class_p_char_373_lionhd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leonhardt.

class_p_char_294_ayer.name: Ayerscarpe's Kernel Token
class_p_char_294_ayer.description: A self-authored reconnaissance and counter-reconnaissance manual. His thought process was, 'it's best to keep yourself protected under any circumstance.'
class_p_char_294_ayer.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ayerscarpe.

class_p_char_344_beewax.name: Beeswax's Kernel Token
class_p_char_344_beewax.description: A full set of horn care supplies, including essential oils, soft brushes, and sandpaper strips. Custom-made by desert tribes, incredibly expensive and hard to find, you can just use it for a manicure - as long as you can stomach the cost.
class_p_char_344_beewax.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beeswax.

class_p_char_349_chiave.name: Chiave's Kernel Token
class_p_char_349_chiave.description: A badge that he made himself, representing the 'Chiave Gang.' Your name is also engraved upon it.
class_p_char_349_chiave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chiave.

class_p_char_218_cuttle.name: Andreana's Kernel Token
class_p_char_218_cuttle.description: A handmade model gun, painstakingly crafted by the Operator herself.
class_p_char_218_cuttle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Andreana.

class_p_char_415_flint.name: Flint's Kernel Token
class_p_char_415_flint.description: A sharp stone dagger made by Flint herself, normally used by the owner to carve roasted meat. While useful for a variety of outdoor environments, be careful not to cut yourself!
class_p_char_415_flint.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flint.

class_p_char_365_aprl.name: April's Kernel Token
class_p_char_365_aprl.description: An album including the song 'April,' still freshly packaged and tied up in a lovely ribbon.
class_p_char_365_aprl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of April.

class_p_char_346_aosta.name: Aosta's Kernel Token
class_p_char_346_aosta.description: A Siracusan-style fedora handcrafted by the man himself. The fabric used in its construction is of very high quality, a clear example of his fine attention to detail.
class_p_char_346_aosta.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aosta.

class_p_char_436_whispr.name: Whisperain's Kernel Token
class_p_char_436_whispr.description: An old-fashioned cinema ticket stub. The proof of a single memory. The ink on it falling off, old and yellowing, becoming indistinct with age.
class_p_char_436_whispr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Whisperain.

class_p_char_214_kafka.name: Kafka's Kernel Token
class_p_char_214_kafka.description: An assiduously cared-for bonsai. Attached is a card, upon which is written: 'I buried a knife in here. It can peel apples, if you ever need.'
class_p_char_214_kafka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kafka.

class_p_char_338_iris.name: Iris's Kernel Token
class_p_char_338_iris.description: A manually bound book of fairytales. A collection never released to the market, each illustration hand-drawn by its creator.
class_p_char_338_iris.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Iris.

class_p_char_455_nothin.name: Mr. Nothing's Kernel Token
class_p_char_455_nothin.description: A paper fan, its frame made of special materials, on it written 'nonexistent and nothing.'
class_p_char_455_nothin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mr. Nothing.

class_p_char_363_toddi.name: Toddifons's Kernel Token
class_p_char_363_toddi.description: A delicately cut icosahedral crystal gemstone. By her logic, things you slough off onto others in passing can't be called gifts.
class_p_char_363_toddi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Toddifons.

class_p_char_103_angel.name: Exusiai's Kernel Token
class_p_char_103_angel.description: A Best Boss medal. Collect five of these to exchange for a Super Boss medal.
class_p_char_103_angel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Exusiai.

class_p_char_112_siege.name: Siege's Kernel Token
class_p_char_112_siege.description: A large, hard rivet. Made by workers in Londinium, it will return to its homeland in the end.
class_p_char_112_siege.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Siege.

class_p_char_134_ifrit.name: Ifrit's Kernel Token
class_p_char_134_ifrit.description: A long novel telling a legendary story. It is badly burned and you can only barely make out the words.
class_p_char_134_ifrit.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ifrit.

class_p_char_180_amgoat.name: Eyjafjalla's Kernel Token
class_p_char_180_amgoat.description: A small pair of scissors. The handle is carefully wrapped in heat-resistant cloth.
class_p_char_180_amgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla.

class_p_char_291_aglina.name: Angelina's Kernel Token
class_p_char_291_aglina.description: A lime flavored lip balm. The wind in the wilds is as dry as the nights in the city.
class_p_char_291_aglina.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Angelina.

class_p_char_147_shining.name: Shining's Kernel Token
class_p_char_147_shining.description: A white pendant. It looks normal, but it cannot be stained by dust.
class_p_char_147_shining.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shining.

class_p_char_179_cgbird.name: Nightingale's Kernel Token
class_p_char_179_cgbird.description: A box of messy puzzles. The real problem is many pieces are missing.
class_p_char_179_cgbird.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightingale.

class_p_char_136_hsguma.name: Hoshiguma's Kernel Token
class_p_char_136_hsguma.description: An old manga. It tells the story of an unknown monster becoming a hero with the help of his friends.
class_p_char_136_hsguma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoshiguma.

class_p_char_202_demkni.name: Saria's Kernel Token
class_p_char_202_demkni.description: Several security cooperation contracts. Some of them already have a gray calcareous stamp on them.
class_p_char_202_demkni.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saria.

class_p_char_172_svrash.name: SilverAsh's Kernel Token
class_p_char_172_svrash.description: One of only a few extant Originium Ice crystals that represent sincerity. It will never melt.
class_p_char_172_svrash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of SilverAsh.

class_p_char_263_skadi.name: Skadi's Kernel Token
class_p_char_263_skadi.description: A song written in her mother tongue. Although you can't understand a word of it, she IS going to teach it to you.
class_p_char_263_skadi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi.

class_p_char_010_chen.name: Ch'en's Kernel Token
class_p_char_010_chen.description: This thing has been sealed for a long time. She didn't forget it. It's just that she can't bear to touch that rusty point again. Perhaps someday it will burn again.
class_p_char_010_chen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en.

class_p_char_340_shwaz.name: Schwarz's Kernel Token
class_p_char_340_shwaz.description: A crossbow. Well maintained and easy to use. But the tiny scratches and dents on it provide some insight into all the killing it has done.
class_p_char_340_shwaz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Schwarz.

class_p_char_188_helage.name: Hellagur's Kernel Token
class_p_char_188_helage.description: A thick thread-bound book that will never be lent to anyone else. Its pages describe the decades of war in Ursus, and the dried ink carries a long history of suffering.
class_p_char_188_helage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hellagur.

class_p_char_248_mgllan.name: Magallan's Kernel Token
class_p_char_248_mgllan.description: A fossilized branch covered in snow. The mighty tree this came from once spread its roots throughout the land, but this branch is all that remains to tell its story.
class_p_char_248_mgllan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Magallan.

class_p_char_213_mostma.name: Mostima's Kernel Token
class_p_char_213_mostma.description: It's her blunderbuss. She doesn't need it anymore.
class_p_char_213_mostma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mostima.

class_p_char_017_huang.name: Blaze's Kernel Token
class_p_char_017_huang.description: A glass bottle with hard-to-discern contents inside. After being shaken a few times, the bottle heats up, making it perfect for keeping one's hands warm in the winter.
class_p_char_017_huang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blaze.

class_p_char_225_haak.name: Aak's Kernel Token
class_p_char_225_haak.description: A bottle filled with 6 different-colored pills. No instructions are provided.
class_p_char_225_haak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aak.

class_p_char_2013_cerber.name: Ceobe's Kernel Token
class_p_char_2013_cerber.description: An origami knife that took a long time to fold. It's crooked, full of extra creases, and rough around the edges. Wonder if the recipient will like it?
class_p_char_2013_cerber.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceobe.

class_p_char_222_bpipe.name: Bagpipe's Kernel Token
class_p_char_222_bpipe.description: A handful of quinoa. The land breeds life, and life returns to feed the land.
class_p_char_222_bpipe.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bagpipe.

class_p_char_250_phatom.name: Phantom's Kernel Token
class_p_char_250_phatom.description: An old music score. The notes upon the manuscript have long been blurred by the passage of time.
class_p_char_250_phatom.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Phantom.

class_p_char_400_weedy.name: Weedy's Kernel Token
class_p_char_400_weedy.description: A sheaf of Bionic Seadragon blueprints. Crammed with helpful annotations from the designer herself, who's written 'even a beckbeast could make one from scratch with this.' And she's probably right.
class_p_char_400_weedy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Weedy.

class_p_char_197_poca.name: Rosa's Kernel Token
class_p_char_197_poca.description: A paper cutter. She solemnly handed it to you, but you're not sure why.
class_p_char_197_poca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosa.

class_p_char_358_lisa.name: Suzuran's Kernel Token
class_p_char_358_lisa.description: A handful of lily-of-the-valley flowers. When Lisa was asked what she had in mind for her code name, she happened to have her arms around a pot filled with these flowers.
class_p_char_358_lisa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Suzuran.

class_p_char_293_thorns.name: Thorns's Kernel Token
class_p_char_293_thorns.description: A small vial of medicinal fluid, a reminder of some of his earliest work; Danger, use with caution.
class_p_char_293_thorns.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Thorns.

class_p_char_416_zumama.name: Eunectes's Kernel Token
class_p_char_416_zumama.description: A wrench that seems to been used for a long time. Useful for mechanical manufacturing, or self-defense in a pinch.
class_p_char_416_zumama.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eunectes.

class_p_char_350_surtr.name: Surtr's Kernel Token
class_p_char_350_surtr.description: A photocopied document filled with place names, several of which have been crossed out in red. If you have time, you can help scout these locations.
class_p_char_350_surtr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Surtr.

class_p_char_423_blemsh.name: Blemishine's Kernel Token
class_p_char_423_blemsh.description: A book of a knight's tale; an absurd legend, legendary absurdity.
class_p_char_423_blemsh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blemishine.

class_p_char_311_mudrok.name: Mudrock's Kernel Token
class_p_char_311_mudrok.description: A tiny little rock sculpture. It looks like it's 'gazing' at you inquisitively.
class_p_char_311_mudrok.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mudrock.

class_p_char_264_f12yin.name: Mountain's Kernel Token
class_p_char_264_f12yin.description: A fine grape wine, all wrapped up. Its place of origin appears to be a very famed Columbian winery; we don't know by what means he obtained it.
class_p_char_264_f12yin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mountain.

class_p_char_332_archet.name: Archetto's Kernel Token
class_p_char_332_archet.description: A Monastery limited commemoration badge. Meant to be bought, but just call this one a gift of friendship!
class_p_char_332_archet.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Archetto.

class_p_char_362_saga.name: Saga's Kernel Token
class_p_char_362_saga.description: A wooden fish she carved by herself. When on edge, just chant the sutras with her.
class_p_char_362_saga.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saga.

class_p_char_472_pasngr.name: Passenger's Kernel Token
class_p_char_472_pasngr.description: An ancient Sargon gold coin. Sent to and fro by the long hands of fate, it now belongs to you.
class_p_char_472_pasngr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Passenger.

voucher_vigil.name: Vigil's Folder
voucher_vigil.description: These personal notes record thoughts on Nuova Volsinii's construction, the diligence and urgency of the writer plain to see. At the very back, however, are mixed in some pages of traditional Siracusan recipes.
voucher_vigil.usage: A folder storing personal notes. Vigil is obtained the first time this item is obtained, and can improve Vigil's Potential thereafter.

voucher_ulika.name: U-Official's Folder
voucher_ulika.description: A bunch of papers recording the streamer's various experiences in cute handwriting, but when flipped over becomes a map of a nomadic city, with detailed markings noting the frequency of debt collectors showing up.
voucher_ulika.usage: A folder with handwritten notes inside. Used to obtain U-Official for the first time, and subsequently improve the potential of U-Official.

voucher_lessng.name: Lessing's Folder
voucher_lessng.description: Several proverbs are written on the paper with tidy, print-like handwriting. The pen has penetrated the paper in a few places. There are also a few scribbles about things that need to be done.
voucher_lessng.usage: A folder storing personal notes. Lessing is obtained the first time this item is obtained, and can improve Lessing's Potential thereafter.
